title: No train service between Woodlands and Kranji

updates.text: [NSL] Free bus service between #Kranji and #Sembawang have ceased.
[NSL] Service on both bounds between #Kranji and #Admiralty have resumed. Free bus service will continue until further notice
[NSL] Service on both bounds between #Kranji and #Admiralty have resumed. Expect longer travel times as we clear the crowds at the stations
[NSL]: No train service between #Admiralty and #Kranji in both directions. Free bus service available between Kranji and Sembawang
[NSL]: No train service between #Admiralty and #Kranji in both directions. We are working to restore service
[NSL]: No train service between #Admiralty and #Kranji in both directions. We are working to recover the service.
[NSL]: No train service between #Admiralty and #Kranji in both directions. Free bus and bus bridging are available.
[NSL]: No train service between #Woodlands and #Kranji in both directions, due to traction power fault. We are recovering the service.
[NSL]: No train service between #Woodlands and #Kranji in both directions. Free bus and bus bridging are available.
[NSL]: No train service between #Woodlands and #Kranji in both directions, due to traction power fault.
[NSL]: No train service between #Woodlands and #Kranji in both directions. Free bus are available.
